publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2247 Susan Deacon: Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm*
S1M-2247 Susan Deacon: Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm
